flawed_nl_solution:
The original length of the bathroom is 96 sq ft/8 ft = <<96/8=12>>12 ft
The new length of the bathroom is 12ft + 2 ft = <<12+2=14>>14 ft
The new width of the bathroom is 8 ft + 2 ft = <<8+2=14>>14 ft
The new area of the bathroom is 14ft x 14 ft = <<14*14=196>>196 sq ft
#### 196

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
